creator: 林一二
title: gt6796c/mermaid-tw5
author: gt6796c
description: Mermaid lets you create diagrams and visualizations using text and code.
name: mermaid-tw5
readme:
This is a TiddlyWiki plugin for using [[mermaid.js|https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/]].

It is completely self-contained, and doesn't need an Internet connection in order to work. It works both in the browser and under Node.js.

It is currently based on [[mermaid.js 8.13.2|http://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid]]

!! Installation
You can drag the plugin link into your TiddlyWiki to install, from http://efurlanm.github.io/mermaid-tw5

!! Dependencies
;This plugin requires:
*[[rocklib Plugin|https://gt6796c.github.io]]
(will be auto installed by CPL)
